thread.title_full: Jerry Hall arrives in Melbourne with Rupert Murdoch | Daily Mail Online

author: Daniel Peters For Daily Mail Australia
title: Jerry Hall arrives in Melbourne with Rupert Murdoch | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Ms Hall was famously married to Rolling Stones frontman Mick Jagger, and had four kids with the English singer and actor before their divorce in 1999. She was rumoured to be dating Murdoch in 2015, and after a whirlwind five-month romance the pair married during a low-key ceremony in London earlier this year. The powerhouse couple married in March, 2016, after a five-month whirlwind romance Sarah Murdoch (centre), who was born in Britain but raised in Australia, also wore an all-white outfit as she hopped off the private jet Murdoch, 85, looked dapper in a classic navy suit with matching tie and white shirt Ms Hall (left) was famously married to Rolling Stones frontman Mick Jagger before separating in 1999. The pair have four children together On January 20, Ms Hall and Murdoch were among an elite turnout invited to Kirribilli House for Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull's belated Christmas party. The CEO's of Seven West, Qantas and Coca-Cola Amatil were among other prestigious guests for the secretive function, which was put on ice due to Mr Turnbullâ€™s over-crowded calendar during the New Year period. The Murdoch family congregated on the tarmac before stepping into a luxury car On January 20, Ms Hall (centre) and Murdoch were among an elite turnout invited to Kirribilli House for Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull's belated Christmas party High-profile gathering: Lachlan (far left) and Sarah Murdoch (right) gather around Rupert Murdoch and wife Jerry Hall Moraga Estate in California's exclusive Bel Air enclave was bought by Rupert Murdoch in 2013, and a bottle of red can cost upwards of $400 (boxes of wine pictured right) Share or comment on this article 92
